      • prepareAudio

        public boolean prepareAudio(@NonNull
                            AudioAttributes attrs)
        Description copied from interface: ICameraHelper
        Call this method before use @startStream. If not you will do a stream without audio.
        Specified by:
        prepareAudio in interface ICameraHelper
        Parameters:
        attrs - AudioAttributes
        Returns:
        true if success, false if you get a error (Normally because the encoder selected doesn't support any configuration seated or your device hasn't a AAC encoder).

      • prepareVideo

        public boolean prepareVideo(@NonNull
                            VideoAttributes profile)
        Description copied from interface: ICameraHelper
        Use VideoAttributes and portrait
        Specified by:
        prepareVideo in interface ICameraHelper
        Returns:
        true if success, false if you get a error (Normally because the encoder selected doesn't support any configuration seated or your device hasn't a H264 encoder).

      • prepareVideo

        public boolean prepareVideo(@NonNull
                            VideoAttributes attrs,
                            int rotation)
        Specified by:
        prepareVideo in interface ICameraHelper
        Parameters:
        attrs - VideoAttributes
        rotation - could be 90, 180, 270 or 0 (Normally 0 if you are streaming in landscape or 90 if you are streaming in Portrait). This only affect to stream result. NOTE: Rotation with encoder is silence ignored in some devices.
        Returns:
        true if success, false if you get a error (Normally because the encoder selected doesn't support any configuration seated or your device hasn't a H264 encoder).

        Specified by:
        startStream in interface ICameraHelper
        Parameters:
        liveEndpoint - of the stream like: rtmp://ip:port/application/stream_name

        RTMP: rtmp://192.168.1.1:1935/fmp4/live_stream_name
